Reviews.Title: Better than OEM
Reviews.Author: John G. Frykman "jfrykman"
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the product and the value.  The "off-brand" Bower batteries are actually rated at 1800 mAh in comparison to the 1240 mAh rating of the Sony branded battery. That is nearly 50% higher capacity.  Does the charge last longer?  My experience is that the charge lasts significantly longer.  The charger itself is certainly not "of lower quality" as another post here suggests.  I'm not sure what charger it is being compared to as so far, no one has seen a Sony charger for this battery.  It charges from "empty" to full charge in about 1-1/2 hours. It also comes with an adapter for your car's power outlets and a European-style receptacle adapter.  I have not tried either, but will see how well the charger works in a car.  Being able to charge a spare battery in a car is a huge plus for people on the move.  This same charger can be purchased for as little as $4.75 elsewhere by itself, and the batteries at $8.80.  That compares favorably with the price of the kit here.  The Sony brand batteries are list priced at $49.95 although you can get them for as little as around $32 on line.  But that is still nearly four times as much for a battery that has less capacity.  Yes, they are Chinese manufactured just as the DSC-RX100 is, and just as the OEM battery is.If is certainly possible that the OEM battery has a longer useful life, but the Bower battery has a 5-year guaranty.  If the battery lasts 1/5 that long in daily use I will be happy--after all, they are a consumable.  The camera itself has a 1-year guaranty and it is not "consumable."In summary, no one should avoid these products because they do not carry the Sony brand.  They are well built and represent a solid value.  I will not be buying a Sony battery at four times the price when I can obtain a product that is certainly worth more than 1/4 the price of OEM batteries.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: Mikey_B
Reviews.Content: I bought this kit the day after I received my RX100. Went on a 7-day cruise four days later. Charged the Sony battery and the two Bowers. Used the Bower charger on the Sony battery and it worked just fine. Day 1 of the trip loaded a Bower battery in the RX100 and never looked back. Took 700 pictures in a week and did a partial internal charge on the same Bower battery in the camera one time. Carried the Sony battery and the other Bower in my camera case and never used them. I did a lot of viewing and deleting as I went. I took nine short videos (average of 2 minutes) and the rest were the 700 shots at 20MP using the two-minute shutdown feature on the camera to conserve battery life. The battery indicator on the camera stayed full a long time before it showed usage. A minor issue since I had two others ready to go. The Bowers are rated at 1800 mAh. Sony at 1240 mAh. Some say the higher rating is exaggerated but I would be hard to convince at this point. Very good bargain since the Sony battery is a little less than twice the price for the kit. I sold digital cameras for almost eight years, owned 5 high-end Sonys from the F505 to the R1, which I still travel with. The RX100 is phenomenal and it is my first Sony camera in which I have used third-party batteries. I am a Sony purist no longer. Excellent bargain. Would certainly buy again. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: OK But
Reviews.Author: Early Rider "ER"
Reviews.Content: The battery worked fine for a day of massive shooting and filming but I don't think it is as good as the original.The indicator on the camera showed little sign of wear after a day but when I was filming a bear it suddenly cut out saying the battery was exhausted. In other words it seems like it's all or nothing so if the indicator shows any wear don't trust that there's a lot of power left and get it to the charger. The fact that you get two battery's and a charger that can be used in the house or car still, in my opinion, makes it a good buy.

Reviews.Title: It does the job well
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: I resolved not to be caught again with a dead camera and no spare battery.  So when I got the RX100 I looked for reasonably priced backup batteries and a convenient recharger.  This recharger and batteries seem to satisfy those requirements.  The charger is small enough to easily carry on trips and the inclusion of a European plug adapter (as well as the US plug) and AC adapter increase it's utility.  And the batteries do what batteries are supposed to do.  They charge and power the camera.One word about the 4 star rating.  To date I've been satisfied with the recharger and batteries, but I've only had then for a few days.  If they continue to perform as they have so far I'd give it the extra star.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: Tony Korody
Reviews.Content: I ordered this package of goodies because I needed and external charger for the RX100. The deal sounded too good to be true with an external charger w/car adapter, 2 batteries that Sony sells for $39.95 each, screen protector and cleaning cloth. I decided to take the gamble knowing if I had a problem with the order Amazon would be sure I received a refund. Well, I have to admit I was pleasantly surprised when the Priority Mail envelope arrived with the order and not only did the charger work but the batteries seem to have a longer life than Sony's. Next time I see something from Big Mike's I won't hesitate to order.

Reviews.Title: Batteries as good as the original
Reviews.Author: Thomas B. Cass
Reviews.Content: Not much to say except everything works great. The charger is great so now I can charge 2 batteries at the same time, one in camera, one in charger. The 2 included batteries are as good as the one that came with the camera, in fact I suspect they are the same battery without the Sony name. The screen protectors and cleaning cloth are just bonuses.

Reviews.Title: The Capacity is a short of a genuine Sony battery.
Reviews.Author: Jung-Ah Min
Reviews.Content: I have a brand new sony action cam with genuine NP-BX1 battery.I compared these no-brand batteries I just got yesterday.I set my camera to run on time-lapse mode, continuously taking pictures until it runs out of battery.Results:Sony Original NP-BX1 : 3 hours and  12 minutesNo Brand #1 : 2 hours and 56 minutesNo Brand #2 : 2 hours and 49 minutes.All batteries are charged to full before testing with the charger that came with the package.I wouldn`t say that is all too bad, but I have to say claimed 1600mAh capacity of these no-brand batteries are totally false advertisement. The sony original battery has capacity of 1240mAh. You do the math. :)I give only three stars because the capacity is not 1600mAh. As always these no-brand batteries will deteriorate much sooner than the original ones.PLUS:FYI, mine came with a nice box package with grey batteries in it. The charger is slightly different. But they look nice and I`m not complaining about that.

Reviews.Title: Useful product at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: pengu1n
Reviews.Content: Love my Sony RX100 camera, but hated that I had to charge the battery in the camera.  This product was the answer to my dilemma.  This is a great price for a battery charger and it also comes with 2 spare batteries.  They're not original Sony ones, but they seem to work just fine.  It also includes a car charger and a few other extras.  I'm very happy with the quality.  I would definitely buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Alan Heatherington
Reviews.Content: I would expect to pay something close to this price just for a back-up battery. To have a compact charger complete with European plug adapter and TWO extra batteries seems luxurious, not to mention the lens cleaning cloth. We travel extensively in Europe and take hundreds of photos on each trip. I know that we will be grateful for this purchase over and over.

Reviews.Title: Repalcement battery for RX100
Reviews.Author: Salman Akhtar
Reviews.Content: The charger is a must have for RX100 owners as the camera does not come with one. The original option of charging the battery within the camera is not good and obviously no good for getting additional spare batteries charged while using the camera. The charger is compact and fits the battery perfectly. The two batteries that came with it work as good as the original Sony one so far.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: K. Root "quality not quantity"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase.  I received the batteries and charger quickly and well packaged.  Appearance is exactly as I expected from the photos and other reviews.  Seems to be quality products at a very good price.  The charger seems to be well made and has worked well for the few times that I've used it to charge the batteries.  Batteries are initially working fine but I'll withhold judgement on those until I've used these for a few years as to the life of the batteries.  Haven't yet done any quantitative tests to see how much power they store compared to the original Sony battery.

Reviews.Title: Convenient Accessory
Reviews.Author: William T.
Reviews.Content: This charger along with the spare batteries work well with my RX100. I take alot of pictures and sometimes I am unable to charge batteries everyday. With these extras I can go for days without the need to charge batteries. It works out great for me.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: LonerBoy
Reviews.Content: Two batteries plus a charger that seems well made, for less than the price of a single Sony-branded battery alone. Batteries are fully compatible but have higher capacity than the one that came with the camera. Charger seems well made.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: albert becker
Reviews.Content: This works well with my Sony DSC HX 300. At this point i consider it to be an excellent value. Nice to have two spare batteries. The charger can be used at home and also in the car. I did not yet try it in car. There appears to be no downside here.

Reviews.Title: Serves its purpose.
Reviews.Author: T. Trzcinski
Reviews.Content: These batteries don't work exactly the same as the OEM (the battery gauge on the camera reads full until the batteries are nearly dead) but otherwise they work very well and the charger is very handy with multiple power options.

Reviews.Title: Working great so far!
Reviews.Author: WanderingStar
Reviews.Content: I took these batteries, along with the original battery for the Sony dsc-rx100, into the Grand Canyon for 6 days of backpacking, and I only needed the original and one extra... these replacements lasted for pretty much the same duration as the original battery, and are still going strong. Awesome! Other reviews have reported inaccuracies with the battery life monitors in their cameras with the replacement batteries, but thus far I have not had any issues (my camera has given me a fairly accurate battery level readout with these batteries). Additionally, the charger works quickly with both these batteries and the original for the camera.

Reviews.Title: This the best deal ever!!!Do not waste your money on Sony Batteries
Reviews.Author: AngryD
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money on Sony Batteries.  These work fine, you get the same amount of time out of a charge.  Not only does it come with 2 batteries, but you get the Charger and the car adapter aswell.  Mine came with a screen protector and a lens cloth.  I'M SO HAPPY RIGHT NOW!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jmf
Reviews.Content: 2x the pictures/video per charge. And with 2 batteries  I can now take 1500 pictures or more without finding a wall outlet.  With these batteries you definitely need a 32GB card (or two) or you will run out of storage before you run out of power. The charger is awesome as well. It works in the car (with included adapter) and at home.Purchase 01/2013It is now 05/2013 -- these batteries and charger are still working great!

Reviews.Title: Great accessories for P&S;
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Photo Guy"
Reviews.Content: Great set of accessories. The screen protectors are generic but you get 3 sheets. The independent charger works fine and does not tie up the camera while charging. Great price too.

Reviews.Title: A  good value, and the charger is a real plus
Reviews.Author: JustWill
Reviews.Content: I needed a backup battery for my new Sony RX 100 camera, but the Sony brand battery is a bit pricy.  Big Mike's offers two batteries for a lower price, plus they throw in a charger to boot.  Although Sony doesn't provide a charger with the camera, I had thought I could get by without one, but the one that came with the batteries has already come in handy on a couple of occasions.  It's a nice thoughtful touch.  Oh, and the batteries and the charger seem to work fine - no problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding RX-100 Battery  and Charger Kit.
Reviews.Author: David Blynn
Reviews.Content: A great kit, very reasonably priced, it provided me with two batteries and a charger kit, one not available from SONY. The batteries took the proper charge and worked well in the camera. The charger also charged the SONY original battery properly. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Misleading photograph of product and batteries don't last as long as the original
Reviews.Author: A. F. Wakefield "Gadget Freak"
Reviews.Content: When I received the product I thought I would get two Sony branded batteries because the product picture displays them as such. However, the batteries are of a different brand. Also, I noticed that the charge in the batteries does not last as long as the original battery that came with the camera.  Even so, I think this is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Sony CyberShot DSC-RX100 Digital Camera Battery & Charger Kit
Reviews.Author: wjjk
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this replacement battery and charger kit.  No problems; works great and has a great price.  Plus the bonus LCD Screen Protectors and Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth is an excellent addition.

Reviews.Title: Works as Expected
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: I've used the battery charger a few times with no issues.  I haven't used the DC plug in the car yet.  The batteries seem to be working fine so far.  Screen protectors aren't the best, but I didn't expect much in that regard.  The microfiber cleaning cloth  isn't anything special, but I'm sure I'll find a use for it.I bought this for the Sony RX100 because it doesn't come with an external charger, and the cover over the micro-usb port seems flimsy and subject to damage from normal use.  This product takes care of that problem and is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Misleading description
Reviews.Author: L "the only one"
Reviews.Content: Just to be clear: This is not a Sony product. The batteries in question are Chinese "replacements". Images presented on this page have been edited to remove the "Bower" brand that appears on the units you will receive.The charger is also a Chinese product of lower quality.Other than that, only time will tell how this product will compare to the real thing.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Poremski
Reviews.Content: Just got this.  Charged them up and they are good to go.  No more worries about running out of battery power while videoing ballgames.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What we wanted!!!
Reviews.Author: Linnie
Reviews.Content: Bought the new Sony CyberShot camera (dropped and killed the old one, sadly)... Wanted to to be able to recharge the batteries for it when we when we are traveling, as well as at home... It plugs into to an outlet  as well as having the attachment for charging in the car... Pefect! The service was great. The price was a really good deal too!

Reviews.Title: Great add-on
Reviews.Author: T. Khetia
Reviews.Content: This was a great Add-on to my Sony AS100 list of accessories, because, as we all know, the battery life on that camera is a crapshoot because of the live-preview through the phone. This is a cheap alternative, considering that swapping the batteries can be done in less than a minute.

Reviews.Title: good product great price
Reviews.Author: iphotoghosts "iphotoghosts"
Reviews.Content: works well with my sony camera and battery lasted long time.  I am surprised how long it has lasted well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A complete power source solution
Reviews.Author: C. Allen Neighorn
Reviews.Content: While seeking a replacement for a vintage Sony Walkman battery, this complete kit for multi-function charging of two battery units was unearthed. While the battery actually fits the compartment, this high capacity battery needs minor adaptation to match up the terminals systems.

Reviews.Title: beats paying for the Sony one
Reviews.Author: S. Cohen
Reviews.Content: ALOT cheaper than buying the Sony branded charger and extra batteries.  I haven't noticed any difference in battery life either.  I use this for a Sony Action Cam

Reviews.Title: Good batteries.  Charger - not so much.
Reviews.Author: Chad P.
Reviews.Content: The OEM charger runs a little over double the amperage.  Simple math, there - the OEM charger charges significantly faster.  Having said that, the batteries last as long (or even longer, in my limited experience) as the OEM battery.  Overall - tough to beat a spare charger and 2 spare batteries for this price.

Reviews.Title: it all works for half price of sony
Reviews.Author: B.L. 597 "597 Pipefitter"
Reviews.Content: every thing works fine, no issues and have cycled batteries a few times, they might last a little less the the sony, but i didn't do any real test

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: ai chan1
Reviews.Content: Seem to keep charge as good as the Sony brand.I am glad  I bought them as back up for video recording.

Reviews.Title: it is so cheap and decent quality
Reviews.Author: Sophia Z
Reviews.Content: I bought it because i dont want to spent too much on batteries and charge as i already spent too much on that camera. I used couple of times, i did not have issues yet. the battery can  last almost a day too.I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: NP-BX1 Charger with batteries included
Reviews.Author: SGBaker "sgb22741"
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy on this set of items.  I needed it as a backup for my original equipment and it worked out just great for me.  Amazing speed in delivering and it is exactly as portrayed on the Amazon.com website.  Would recommend to one and all.  Totally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Works well!
Reviews.Author: Alexander O.
Reviews.Content: Good replacement for the very expensive original battery.  Only charged twice so far, but the charge lasts a good 300-400 pictures on the RX-100 II (without using the flash).

Reviews.Title: For my Sony DSC WX300
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Item was exactly what I expected. Charger and batteries work great and everything arrived on time. Overall a very  good experience.

Reviews.Title: Must have accessory
Reviews.Author: Snorkeling
Reviews.Content: The RX 1 has a small battery. A back up is a must. Charger works well.  Sony batteries last longer, but these are still useful.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly with my RX100-II
Reviews.Author: Aaron W
Reviews.Content: This charger allows me to charge up spare batteries quickly without needing to charge it within the camera. I can continue to use the camera, even as my spare batteries charge at the hotel/home. The car socket is a nice bonus but have not yet used it. I like the way the 2-prong plug folds into the charger making it easier to store.

Reviews.Title: Overall it's fine, except the critical battery life...
Reviews.Author: Ryoizard "Leo the buyer"
Reviews.Content: The batteries pack claims high capacity, but every time my factory sony as15 battery last for 3 hrs, and this battery last for less than 1.5 hrs. it confused me a lot when you are having an expectation discrepancy like this, especially, think about it, on a once-in-a-life-time road trip.

Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied
Reviews.Author: Syed
Reviews.Content: It is a good product. I am happy that I placed an order for this one. Batteries are running good.  Charger is convenient. Can charge from a wall outlet as well as car lighter.. I have no complaints, I would recommend this product to everyone as long as it matches your camera.

Reviews.Title: Batteries both work well and outlast the stock Sony one
Reviews.Author: C. DeGraaf
Reviews.Content: Batteries work well and the charger works, so not much else to say other than I'd buy it again if I needed too.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal and It Works like OEM Batteries
Reviews.Author: James A. Martinez "Lapulapu"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for providing backup power when needed. Using these, I have not experienced the batteries running out of power prematurely.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for use with Sony cameras
Reviews.Author: Alison
Reviews.Content: Batteries charge in about 3-4 hours. You can hook it up to either an outlet or your car. Have extra batteries is essential for your camera. I think this product has met my needs and I recommend it to anyone buying a Sony camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Charger - Good Price
Reviews.Author: Mone Yevol "Real Echelon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this package for my Sony DSC-HX300 camera. The price on this package was unbelievable. Now I have a charger at home and for my car, and 2 batteries. I still can't believe the price. Both batteries work very well and last good enough after being charged.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and value
Reviews.Author: JBCH
Reviews.Content: Solves the problem of not having an extra battery - and the battery life seems to be excellent.  I would buy this again (but should never need to.)

Reviews.Title: Better than OEM!
Reviews.Author: Todd M. Niepke
Reviews.Content: So far I've had no problems with using these in my Sony HDR-AS10 - in fact the battery life is for these is longer than for Sony's!

Reviews.Title: Would recommend
Reviews.Author: Tim H. "Dallasguy"
Reviews.Content: The batteries last longer than the OEM ones that came with my Sony RX-100. I have absolutely nothing negative to say about them. I would purchase them again. There is nothing cheap in regard to their look, feel or performance.

Reviews.Title: Good battery charger
Reviews.Author: Bruce Fagley
Reviews.Content: Comes with 2 batteries so you end up with 3 batteries total, charges fast, will never run out of batteries now! No issues, arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: bobw "keymaster"
Reviews.Content: Product works just as good as the name brand, and the price was hard to beat for two batteries and a charger for home and auto.  I'm a happy camper.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: excellent charger for the sony dsc rx1
Reviews.Author: jnaki
Reviews.Content: hello,  having owned several types of chargers for batteries, this one was the fastest and most complete kit around.  the panasonic camera charger was simplicity and made charging easy.  this charger for the sony is simple, has a car adapter, and came with two extra batteries.  now, that is top notch.  our camera will never be without a full charge battery.  outstanding product and delivery.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value
Reviews.Author: R. Ortiz B.
Reviews.Content: The batteries work just as well as the original, but at a fraction of the cost.  The included charger works like a charm, both with original and alternative batteries.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: UltraRider "UltraRider"
Reviews.Content: For being a "generic", these work very well with the RX100 camera.  And you cannot beat the price on them versus Sony brand!

Reviews.Title: Generic Battery and Charger
Reviews.Author: Rena Park
Reviews.Content: The generic battery and generic charger works OK.I used it for 2 months and so far acceptable.Good value but not up to OEM quality standard.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value.
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The batteries work as good as the OEM brand at a fraction of the price, and the charger is so much more convenient than charging with a USB cord, which puts the camera out of commission.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the Price
Reviews.Author: Ribbit
Reviews.Content: Batteries seem fine.  I think the charge holds fairly well but the meter on my camera declines faster toward the end than my original Sony.  So when I notice it starting to drop off, I change it sooner than I have to w/ original.  The charger itself seems fine, also.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but with quality.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The batteries work as advertised. I took my NEX camera to the Southwest and was pleasantly surprised to havea lot of juice and the charger was able to charge the batteries quicker than normal. There are two fangs to hold the battery better that can get broken easily, but I fixed that by storing one of the spare batteries with the charger. Great product and I was able to charge in the car.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: JBourne
Reviews.Content: This is a good deal for the price. Charger is light and compact with fold out plug. Car charger is good addition. Batteries are a higher amp rating than original Sony battery. Everything works and am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: sony rx1 batterys and charger
Reviews.Author: chin
Reviews.Content: receive battery and charger as ordered, very happy with purchase--the extra battery for this camera is very important, because battery life is veryshort--and the price is a deal with two battery and a external charger. Now I can go anywhere without worrying about running out of battery.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: David J. Colby "Davesebusiness"
Reviews.Content: These batteries work perfectly in my new Sony DSC-HX50V. The charger can be used in the car or at home. All in all a very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Stanley James Nicholl
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for what I was looking for.  You have to charge the battery in camera with the RX100.  I was more interested in just the charger, but the two extra batteries are great...never have to worry about going dead while out somewhere.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: a great deal
Reviews.Author: de la sool
Reviews.Content: Way cheaper than a single Sony battery.  Charger works fine for both the 3rd batteries and my Sony original.  Haven't run any of my batteries to exhaustion so no idea whether these batteries have less, equal, or more capacity compared to the original.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: S. DeMott "turtle"
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to my camera.  Now I'm ready for anything! Lots of battery life now!Great transaction!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: D. Chum
Reviews.Content: Never running out of battery is great!. These seem to last longer than the original Sony battery as well. I would recommend this to anyone who hates having only 2 hours of battery life with a single battery.

Reviews.Title: It works as expected.
Reviews.Author: M. Krueger
Reviews.Content: It works as expected and the batteries seem to be holding up well. For the price I think it is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great Batteries and Charger
Reviews.Author: MarkS "MarkS"
Reviews.Content: This is a great set if you buy a Sony RX100.  The batteries seem to work as well as the Sony brand ones, and you have the additional advantage of being able to charge the batteries outside the camera.  Throw away the screen protectors in the kit, though, as they are pretty worthless.  This charger also works with international voltages, which was handy on my recent trip to Africa.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective solution for all day shooting.
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I bought Sony Action Cam AS15 to use while I'm kayak fishing the flats in Miami's Biscayne Bay. I wanted extra batteries for all day shooting (4 to 6 hours). I was skeptical of the quality but the price was right so I took a chance. I've been through 5 charge cycles so far no issues. For my purposes this deal worked out great and I recommend for anyone who's looking for spare batteries to carry with them. I get roughly the same amount of time out of these as I do the stock battery, 1hr.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: AJK
Reviews.Content: I can finally charge the battery without putting the camera out of commission. Having extra batteries also helps.I'll change the rating to 5 stars if all goes well.

Reviews.Title: Works like it says!
Reviews.Author: Capt. Steve
Reviews.Content: I only bought this because I knew we would need extra batteries while in the Peruvian jungle.  We did!  And this delivered.  It even charged my wife's camera battery when we inadvertently left it in our hotel in Cusco.

Reviews.Title: All appears as described - works well
Reviews.Author: Duane C.
Reviews.Content: I have charged the two new batteries, and, indeed, they charged in about the time specified.  I have not yet used either of them as I'm waiting for the original battery to discharge enough.  Having two spare batteries is a nice plus, assuming they have the charge lifespan of the original battery.  I don't believe the specs printed on the battery box of 1700 mAhrs.  It's hard to believe that capacity in the same space as the original which is only rated around 1200 mAhrs.  But, if it equals the original, then I'm very happy.  The charger pieces slide together nicely, and once assembled, don't need to be disassembled as long as you stick with this one size battery.  Having the car adapter is another very nice plus.  This is how Sony should have shipped the camera - with an external charger.  I don't plan to use the screen protector.  It's a high-gloss one, while the screen itself has an anti-reflective coating on it.  Since I take care of my cameras, I'll leave that off.  So, overall, this is a very nice package, and if I see short battery life I'll amend this review later.

Reviews.Title: Works with Sony AS10 Action Camera
Reviews.Author: Dio
Reviews.Content: The reason I bought this was because I lost my external micro USB provided for my AS10 Action Camera provided by SONY (Normally you charge the battery inside the camera via the cable and a computer/laptop).This charger works with the SONY AS10 battery its two 2100mAh batteries let me rotate spent batteries. It's definitely a solid value at $20 for two extra batteries. What I also like is how compact it is; it can definitely be stowed in a backpack or car no problem.Will update on the battery performance.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader
Reviews.Content: The batteries are rated at 2100mAh. That's nearly double the Sony one.Per other customer's reviews, I replaced them as soon as they dropped one line. This seemed to be short of the picture count predicted by the mAh rating, but long enough. I got 800 shots, 20min of video and a lot of viewing out of two charges.The charger does the job. It's light and compact.Cheap peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Great!  A kit which should be included with the camera!
Reviews.Author: Yifan Z.
Reviews.Content: I'm using this charger and battery combo with the Sony DSC-RX100M II Cyber-shot Digital Still Camera 20.2MP, Black, which is Sony's top of the "point & shoot" camera.  Like most if not all cameras in this category, the camera uses a tiny tiny battery which barely holds any power.  Definitely no good for all day shooting on vacation.  In addition, the camera doesn't ship with a charger, compounding the small battery.  Even if I bought another battery, I would have to charge one battery, swap it out, and charge thee other.  There's no way to use the camera and charge a back up battery at the same time.This charger and battery combo fixes that.  The supplied charger charges batteries relatively quickly, and the two extra batteries ensure plenty of power.The kit comes with- Charger (a generic one which is capable of charing multiple batteries with different holders)- NP-BX1 adapter plate for the charger- 2 generic batteries- European plug adapter- 12V car adapter for charging on the goThe kit also comes with some other goodies:- A little microfiber cloth branded with the seller's logo- A pack of 3 screen protectors, good for 5" screensFor the price, these are excellent.  However, the kit does have some problems:The batteries claim they are 2100mAh, while the genuine Sony ones are rated at 1240mAh.  This rating seems a little generous, if not outright deceptive.  The generic batteries here weigh 21.7g, while the genuine Sony weighs 24.5g.The charger also overcharges the batteries.  Lithium ion batteries are much less robust than other batteries types and are very sensitive to overcharging.  The charge level of these batteries can be measured directly by the voltage of the battery, which shouldn't exceed 4.2 volts.  In camera, the RX100 charged the Sony battery to 4.182V.  This charger took the generic batteries slightly over at 4.247 and 4.254 volts, which is a little high for my liking, thus the 1 star deduction.Overall, I find this product to be a great value and well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Too good to be true???
Reviews.Author: Sue Ellen Harrison
Reviews.Content: The batteries were fine, but the charger only worked one time. It left me in the heart of the U.K. with no working charger. Lucky for me the batteries could be charged while in my camera. And even luckier that I had the proper equipment to do just that. Buy cheap, get cheap. This could have been a real vacation spoiler.

Reviews.Title: Fast Charger
Reviews.Author: Arno Hoerschgens
Reviews.Content: This charger is worth the money I spent - it is really efficient and fast. I am very glad that i bought this one with my new camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice to have!
Reviews.Author: Lynnie
Reviews.Content: Initially I gave a poor review, but I decided to call Customer Service through Big Mike's and everything was taken care of. Now I am extremely happy to have the extra batteries all ready for vacation!

Reviews.Title: The product I received matched the description
Reviews.Author: Sam Burrow "Photo Nut"
Reviews.Content: I am pleased to report that the package I received was exactly as described. Everything works and appears to be built well. This is quite a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John Davidson "Magic Feather"
Reviews.Content: Worked with our RX100 without a problem.  Nice having a charger and backup batteries - something which didn't actually come with our camera.

Reviews.Title: Good replacement of original
Reviews.Author: Amazon Buyer
Reviews.Content: These batteries last the same as the Sony battery after a full charge.  The reason I gave it a 4 instead of 5 is that its indicate Amp Hour is higher than the Sony original but last the same as the Sony.  The charger works fine (have not tried the car adapter).

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jeremy S."
Reviews.Content: 2 batteries and a charger(which the camera does not even come with) for about $20.Can't beat it. Also no problems with the batteries or charger.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Charges my batteries for my sony dsc-rx100 perfectly.  I use this with the aftermarket batteries as well and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the dollar
Reviews.Author: Cranston B. Snord
Reviews.Content: I have used one of these batteries over the last few weeks and it takes a charge and works fine. However, they do not last nearly as long as the original battery that came with the camera (Sony HX300). The original battery is rated at 1250 Mah and I was able to take about 440 photos before the battery was getting low. On these, I get about 180. The label on the battery states these are 1700 Mah cells, but they are more than likely around 600 or 700. The batteries I received also had no brand name on them and they were not like the ones in the photo. Taking everything into consideration, for $17.00 for two, including an external charger, you cannot expect too much. Still a better value than paying $50.00 for the Sony cell. If these batteries crap out in a few months though, I may change my tone!!

Reviews.Title: AAA Seller very good service
Reviews.Author: cool
Reviews.Content: Receive my Charger and 2 batteries but my charger is defective, when I email the seller they immediately send me a new replacement. Very happy with the service.The Charger is now working fine and the battery life last as long as my original sony battery.

Reviews.Title: good price good product
Reviews.Author: Rodger Jacobsen
Reviews.Content: I lost my original charger so I ordered this one, it came fast at a good price and it works.I was confused at first, the contact points didn't look like they would match up but after I stuck the battery in anyway it charged

Reviews.Title: battery's barely got 2 hours of use
Reviews.Author: Rmchicago
Reviews.Content: I went out with the OEM battery and one of these additional non OEM batterys, I got a decent 4-5 hr usage on the sony battery but only got about 2 hours on this battery.  Not sure why it died so fast...definitely felt shorter in terms of battery life.  I will give them a couple more goes, hoping it was something in the camera that drained them...but given the price I cant be too upset.

Reviews.Title: Same strength as Sony product.
Reviews.Author: yaowe ong
Reviews.Content: Same capacity as Sony original vendor but only fraction of the price.  A great deal you do not want to miss.

Reviews.Title: Charger is still working after 8 months, both batteries hve died.
Reviews.Author: Mark W. R. Wilson
Reviews.Content: First battery lasted a couple months, Second battery lasted a couple months more.Charger is fine. No problems with it.Unfortunately, I lost two days of shooting because of the batteries dying at inopportune moments. My Sony battery is hanging in there. I was unable to get a response from the contact information for the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Sony CyberShot DSC-RX100 DSCRX100 DSC-HX300 ... Battery charger etc
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: The charger works well, except that you have to take more care with fitting the battery into the charging slot - it is not as easy as some others I have tried.  But it charges quickly, and the battery seems to hold its charge as long as it should.  The batteries themselves that came with the charger work fine and last at least as long as the Sony name brand one that came with the camera.

Reviews.Title: WOW! Save some money on a Great Product!
Reviews.Author: amazon midwest fan
Reviews.Content: So glad I found this!! I really prefer charging "outside" the camera body, and this fits the bill perfectly!! FANTASTIC price and an extra 2 batteries to boot!! Very Very Pleased!!!

Reviews.Title: Affordable Batteries
Reviews.Author: Audie P.
Reviews.Content: BigMikes ships two different types of batteries.One type is 1700 MAH and comes in plastic case which is in a white box.Other type is 2100 MAH and comes in a black box.I bought myself 6 batteries for an upcoming trip to Belize with my darling Sony RX-100. I knew that with what I would be doing a power outlet would be hard to come by at times. All 6 outperformed the Sony brand batteries and I could not be happier. Months later they continue to show no memory and once or twice a year I get together to charge all my batteries. If you can afford a 600 dollar camera you can blow another 60 dollars on quality batteries.LCD protector is a novelty. Microfiber cloth is not the best one I have ever come across but it's still free.

Reviews.Title: Drop-in replacement that worked as advertised
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set to give me adequate power during a recent trip that I took, and I was very pleased with the results. The plugin adapter functioned as expected, and the batteries were close to if not as good as the stock battery.

Reviews.Title: Essential
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to the Sony RX100.. very helpful since the camera only comes with a cable to charge the battery while in the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good batteries
Reviews.Author: J. beaupre "pastracer"
Reviews.Content: Often when purchasing aftermarket batteries they are not as good as the original manufacturer, these are better! The charger works with the OEM battery as well. Well priced

Reviews.Title: Batteries work great
Reviews.Author: RUSS
Reviews.Content: Batteries and charger worth the money- I always have 3 or more batteries for my trips out-Have found 1 battery last a long time and I leave the camera on -

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and value
Reviews.Author: Wolfgang Gunther
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at the value received for the price. So I bought two, giving me four extra batteries and two chargers for travel. And a lifetime supply of screen protecting film.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Nandor
Reviews.Content: It contains European plug as well, works both 110V and 230V, car adapter too - really it is the best charger ever seen.

Reviews.Title: No problem
Reviews.Author: Makoto
Reviews.Content: As everybody now, original one is very expensive.Also as almost everybody know, 3rd party battery has some risk.But, but! this one is no problems.

Reviews.Title: OEM-Functional, and you get an out-of-camera Battery Charger.
Reviews.Author: Sonny Greene "Sonny.Greene@Gmail.com"
Reviews.Content: I have had zero problems, concerns, or anything else using these batteries--they work perfectly.And the battery charger and extra batteries are critical to the functional and enjoyable operation of your RX1

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe Forman "joefor"
Reviews.Content: The batteries work just fine.  I also like being able to charge the batteries  without having to hook up the camera. I use my RX 100 a lot and it does drain the battery.  This makes it easy to carry extra batteries that are always charged.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Navin S.
Reviews.Content: Good bundled product for the offered price. If you buy all the items individually it might cost 10 times more.

Reviews.Title: Quality batteries and affordable.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Zehm "world traveler"
Reviews.Content: I bought this so I could take my RX100 to the Phililppines for a vacation and not need to worry about running out of batteries on long days. I couldn't be happier for the price and performance. I haven't used the charger, preferring to charge the batteries inside the RX100, so I can't speak to the charger quality. However the batteries are great.Pros:* Inexpensive* Decent battery life (80% as good as the Sony original)Cons:* Battery doesn't report charge accurately to the camera. It says it's fully charged until there is about 10-15% charge left, and then it rapidly drops to two-bars, then one-bar, and it's dead within about 20 minutes.I'd buy it again. The con doesn't outweigh the pros in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Extra battery for Sony RX 100
Reviews.Author: Julian Michael Lesmana
Reviews.Content: Good product. I would recommend this for anybody using the camera very frequent or for foreign trip. Compared to the original, this product is very cheap because it also comes with the travel charger. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: batterys and charger
Reviews.Author: ROBERT E. PENCAK
Reviews.Content: the battery charger and two batteries were shipped promptly. the charger and batteries function as expected with no issues . i donot  notice any difference from the original stock batteries

Reviews.Title: Great deal! A charger and 2 batteries.
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: I've been rotating the batteries with the "Sony Battery" and I don't notice any difference in the number of shots I get per battery.

Reviews.Title: Extra batteries are always a nice thing to have.
Reviews.Author: R. Byrne
Reviews.Content: The HDR-AS15 camera comes with a battery, but does not have a plug-in charger.  That requires a lot of time connected to a computer.  This package of two batteries and a plug-in charger will make sure that I always have extra power while using the camera.  I have not tried the screen protector and may not, but the cleaning cloth also does what it is supposed to.  The product was delivered timely and was just as described.

Reviews.Title: Necessary option for RX100
Reviews.Author: Chris D. "Chris D., Photographer"
Reviews.Content: Convenient battery pack, with car adapter for power.  2 batteries delivered with the kit to assure you never run out of power.

Reviews.Title: They are a good deal
Reviews.Author: Nod Blinkin
Reviews.Content: They seem to be the same as the battery that came with the camera and the charger works well.  It is good to have the back-ups at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it...
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: For $20 i got a charger with a car adapter and two batteries for my Sony RX100. A regular battery, that's ONE battery from Sony is $40. Great deal and works perfectly. Anyone with a Sony RX100 should buy this.

Reviews.Title: This is a must buy.
Reviews.Author: S. Mata "bobmata"
Reviews.Content: If you own a Sony RX100 and need an extra battery with in your budget, this is the one. The charger is wireless, it has a plug on its body and I can stick the whole thing on the power outlet. The car charging cord is detachable and usable so I can bring this on my travels. There are 2 batteries in the package which are awesome plus some protective film which I can use it if I need it.The Seller is excellent but the shipment is kind of slow.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Miller "Tim Miller"
Reviews.Content: Works well in my rx100 and is much cheaper than Sony replacement.  It's nice to have a wall charger that works too since the camera only comes with a USB charging/syncing cable.

Reviews.Title: No Brainer
Reviews.Author: Audric G Coliangco
Reviews.Content: It works, It's cheap, It's great value for money.This is a no brainer to anyone who has the RX100 and/or RX1.I have it and I do not see any difference in quality with the original Sony batteries.External charger is a big plus too ... i still dont understand why Sony wouldnt put one in with its RX1 and RX100 cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to oem
Reviews.Author: Aphonic
Reviews.Content: For the price this can't be beat.  I have three own batteries and this kit.Lychees batteries probably don't last as long as oem, but they aren't far off.It will be interesting to see how they last in comparison.  I don't bias towards ow,, so they all get roughly the same wear.  Ill update this when there's more to report. But at this price, the wall charger works and its two batteries.  Good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Found my way to Tx
Reviews.Content: Perfect accessory deal for the camera.  One always needs spare batteries for a camera and to be able to charge them separately is important

Reviews.Title: Great backup
Reviews.Author: SKBE
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for all I got and am so glad I went ahead and got these for my camera. They work great and alot cheaper than buying through Sony.

Reviews.Title: This is Great Stuff
Reviews.Author: Dan S. Tong "avid SF reader"
Reviews.Content: As others have said this is an excellent deal with a first rate charger and great batteries for a number of Sony cameras, such as the RX-100 for example.It charges rapidly and is far more convenient than charging a battery in the camera.I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Quite Impressive for price
Reviews.Author: SniperScrubb
Reviews.Content: Are you looking for a little extra juice for your RX100? I would say buy this package. For the price, you cannot beat it. And you know what? The items which are actually bundled with this battery are actually quality products. Unlike bundles found in other photo equipment, where people just throw in junk, everything in this bundle is quite useful and of good quality. Including the charger which is from a name brand company, not a junk oversea knockoff. I am not sure how the seller is making any money with all the products in this bundle, after all the amazon fees, but hey.. enjoy it, and buy it.  This seller is decent, and so are the products in the bundle. Love my RX!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Dub32
Reviews.Content: Not much to say, other than it is after market, but good quality to value ratio.  The RX100 is so good on batteries, you may never use a third.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Stylin'Nicole
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of photos, this is a nice little bundle package if you want extra batteries without having to recharge all the time.

Reviews.Title: The missing pieces to making the RX100 a great back up field camera.
Reviews.Author: M. HOLSTEIN
Reviews.Content: The missing pieces to making the RX100 a great back up field camera.  Easy to operate and wonderful to have these back up batteries in the field.

Reviews.Title: Great item and GREATER service!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Gardner
Reviews.Content: I ordered this charger and batteries on a Sunday. It arrived in five days, already excellent shipping time.But what was really outstanding was that when I opened the package, Big Mike had included (for free) a lens cloth and a set of Zeikos screen guard sheets!The charger worked well, charging the included batteries quite quickly. (Of course, the proof of that pudding will be in the shooting).So, product is good, but the service is beyond excellent.I've never dealt with Big Mike before, but I'd do so again, in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: An external battery charger is a must have in my opinion. This one works great and is very well priced. Havn't had a problem so far.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for DSC-RX100
Reviews.Author: Darryl Hazelwood "MD2020"
Reviews.Content: This product is perfect for the RX100 user. Sony dropped the ball with not providing out of camera battery recharging. I recently took a trip and was able to leave the whole charging setup at home and just took a spare charged battery. One less thing to worry about.I highly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Content: I plugged in both batteries into my RX100 as soon as they arrived to check if they bore a charge then removed them immediately after to charge them. Battery indicator on camera showed full. It took about a little over or about 3 hours.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: print man "print man"
Reviews.Content: the charger and two batteries appear to work well, but have not used for long time. The lcd screen protector is quite flimsy.

Reviews.Title: Great spare batteries!
Reviews.Author: sungifts
Reviews.Content: Wanted an external charger and extra batteries for my rx100.  These are perfect!  Car charger adapter is a great addition!

Reviews.Title: Works great, but you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I needed this for my California trip and it did very well! But I must say, don't fall for the mAh rating. You get what you pay for. Yes they worked great, but doing too many video's and having it on, it's not as strong as the lower 1240 mAh SONY battery. Other than that, YES! I would recommend it, it will save you from dying disappointments!

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: J. R. StCyr
Reviews.Content: Like most reviewers, I'm not thrilled that Sony elected to not provide an external charger for a $600+ camera.  This item popped up almost immediately in my search for a charging solution and I'm glad it did.  The two batteries alone make the case for purchasing.  Adding in the charger, which also also provides for charging via a car power socket and this becomes a no brainer.  The cleaning cloth is nice.  I went with a different screen protector so I can't comment on the supplied protector.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine
Reviews.Author: Mr V
Reviews.Content: A good product at a good price.  Batteries charged up fine and the original battery on my camera charged fine also using this device.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: chromejoe
Reviews.Content: Works as well as OEM batteries and chargers as far as I can tell.  Zero complaints, and all for much much less.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: The battery and the charger work excellent , they charge the battery fast to full charge, is compact and easy to carry with the luggage.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot battery charger with 2 included batteries
Reviews.Author: K. T.
Reviews.Content: Big Mike's Electronics is an excellent seller of the Sony Cybershot battery charger with 2 included batteries. The delivery was prompt, the product works well and they have included screen protectors and a handy cleaning cloth.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Peter H.
Reviews.Content: I have only had the batteries for a short time, but they have worked as described.  The charger, LCD screen protectors, and Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth are a bonus.  So far, I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: DSC RX 100 batteries
Reviews.Author: stevem
Reviews.Content: Having a charger and two extra batteries for the Sony RX-100 is great. Users previously had the option of plugging the camera into into a power source and recharging a battery that way. Unless you were very diligent, you suddenly found yourself with no battery power. Having all the extras with the kit, i.e. screen protector, cleaning cloth and euro plug adapter, were a nice plus, too. It's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought this
Reviews.Author: 125 "skellytone"
Reviews.Content: I'm using two RX100s for video, and having extra batteries is important. This package gave me a very compact charger plus two batteries. Exactly what I needed. I haven't tried the screen protectors yet, and I've already got a bunch of polishing cloths in case anybody needs one... ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Arno
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product based on the previous reviews.I was not disappointed. The charger works great and the batteries last.I am glad I bought this combo, only having the original battery would be very limiting.Thanks again for the great product.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This kit arrived very quickly.  There was an issue with one of the prongs on the charger, it was apparent it was a manufacturer defect.  I contacted the seller and they replied within 30 mins.  They apologized and said they would get one out to me immediately.  I would definitely order from Big Mike's Electronics again!!

Reviews.Title: Works as promised
Reviews.Author: Greyman
Reviews.Content: This was advertised as being compatible with the Sony Rx100 camera, and it works as promised. I'm glad I bought this. I especially find the external charger useful but an extra battery never hurts.

Reviews.Title: Sony RX-100 replacement battery
Reviews.Author: loretta j pollock
Reviews.Content: My battery was purchased from Big Mikes Electronics thru Amazon.  The battery works fine, doesn't seem any different from the original battery.

Reviews.Title: Great charger and battery
Reviews.Author: V. Huang
Reviews.Content: The charger works great and I haven't found a difference between the replacement batteries and the sony battery.  Price is very reasonable.  A must have if you don't want to charge your battery in the camera.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Lars
Reviews.Content: Product arrived right as scheduled. Charger and batteries work and may even have a longer charge than the original. The cloth and screen protector are just bonus items. The batteries and charger alone are a steal this price (sub $25)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This is a great alternative to the overpriced sony batteries, the product works just as intended and I have had 0 problems with it. The delivery was on time and very quick, definitely a must have for Sony RX100 owners. Very highly recommended, great job.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: John Bates
Reviews.Content: I have been using Amazon for years and they had some of the best folks doing an excellent job. Big Mike's Electronics is one of those people you really want to work with. On time and first class...Thank you for an outstanding job.John J. Bates. U.S. Army Retired[...]

Reviews.Title: Great charger and spare battery
Reviews.Author: Richard Lau
Reviews.Content: Battery works great and the charger is awesome. The screen protector is also useful and protects the rx100 screen. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Sony RX100 batteries and charger
Reviews.Author: Hans Haebler
Reviews.Content: The product is very satisfactory and fulfils all that was promised.It saves me a lot of money since it is only afraction of the price charged by Sony.

Reviews.Title: Mr
Reviews.Author: manoel
Reviews.Content: The batteries last as long as the original one the charge very quickly. I will not use de LCD screen protectors but they seem ok.

Reviews.Title: As Promised!
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: Perfect experience.  Product arrived within promised time frame and works perfectly.  Using extra batteries as we speak in europe.  Have not used car charger yet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Goldie
Reviews.Content: This product is perfect!...Just as described.Nicely packaged and I received it right away.What a great deal...2 batteries and a wall and car charger!

Reviews.Title: Great for keeping camera at ready
Reviews.Author: T. Harrell
Reviews.Content: Great service, the package arrived in short order with everything well packaged for shipment and everything intact. Having a second and third battery in addition to having means to charge two simultaneously should keep the camera always ready to shoot. Haven't tried the screen protectors.Having the ability to charge in your car is a great idea--the cigarette lighter plug powers the same charger that plugs into the wall, which has the ability to fold the wall socket inserts into the case for easier packing. Seems like a great value--custom screen savers cost me about $10 each.

Reviews.Title: Appears to be a good deal
Reviews.Author: Vance Adkins
Reviews.Content: So far this seems to be a good deal. I haven't had them long but so far they hold up well and the charge is nice with the folding blades. Makes it much more portable.

Reviews.Title: satisfaction
Reviews.Author: O-K R Y
Reviews.Content: i am happy with my perchas , the servic the price is so good , what ever i need this place will be my priorety to buy from . thank you Big Mike's Electronics

Reviews.Title: Batteries work well.
Reviews.Author: SL
Reviews.Content: The batteries seem to last as long as the batteries that came with the camera. It's nice to have a dedicated charger, so, I can continue to use the camera while a battery is charging. The bonus LCD protector I get from this purchase is cheap. I installed, it but took it off after a day of use, because of intensified reflection and the LCD became harder to see in bright day light. All in all, for the price, I'm happy with what I got--reliable batteries.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Eric "webfanatic"
Reviews.Content: While these aren't Sony branded products, the 2 batteries have slightly higher mAh ratings than the battery that comes with the camera. Buying this kit gives you the ideal power setup for a vacation: 2 in the bag, 1 always in the wall. Everything is working great.

Reviews.Title: Great if you have an RX-100
Reviews.Author: C. Fong
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Appear to be very similar to original battery that came with RX-100--perhaps identical by supplier to Sony. Charger is very helpful since Sony does not provide one and expects users to charge inside the camera, which can be inconvenient and cumbersome.  The RX-100 is a fantastic little cameras and these batteries extend its usefulness.Also shipped very quickly and  without issues by this vendor.

Reviews.Title: Holds a charge
Reviews.Author: mikelpeg
Reviews.Content: Having used a lot of off brand batteries, the battery at this point holds a charge as good as the original Sony. Hate when I go on a trip, haven't use the camera for a few weeks, turn on the camera and battery power is half way down on a battery I fully charged. I can't say if I get as many exposures as the Sony, but it is pretty close. For less than the price of a single Sony Battery, you get two batteries and a charger, plus a few extras. Delivery was fast and on time so I have no complaints here.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Charger works fine with manufacturer's battery and two batteries included have higher capacity than battery that came with the camera.  So far no problems whatsoever and cost makes it a huge bargain.  The screen protectors I'm not likely to use and the microfiber cloth seems as good as any.  As a bonus, the charge has a swing out AC plug but also an attachment to work from a car's power socket.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: MLR
Reviews.Content: Item ordered was a bundle of 2 NP-BX1 batteries, charger, etc.  Package arrived without the batteries.  I had ordered a camera and these batteries for an event with my son ... package was a day late but still arrived in time for the event .. of little consequence as the batteries did not arrive.---Investigated the cost of returning the cost of returning the package.  At 2/3rds the cost it isn't worth it and guess I'll just have to eat it.  Will investigate Amazon's and Seller's desire to make it right and just ship the missing batteries.

Reviews.Title: Not what is pictured
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: Just received this order and you should be aware that what is actually shipped is different from what is pictured on the Amazon page.  What is shown are Sony batteries, and what is shipped are LE brand batteries.  The charger is also different from what is pictured.  What was shipped is a Vivitar Rapid Travel Charger.  Not having had a chance to test them yet, right now I'm assuming they are quality components and will perform as expected.  The batteries are type NP-BX1.  The charger, while the packaging says QC-105, there has been a label added to the outside of the packaging that says "Compatible with Sony NP-BX1."

Reviews.Title: Forget about it Can not attach / put battery into charging unit
Reviews.Author: Harold Sletzinger
Reviews.Content: Can not attach / put battery into charging unit  Do not purchase Product is poor quality. Difficult to plug into vertical outlet - plug folds back into unit

Reviews.Title: Battery Dead so Quick
Reviews.Author: Eastsummer
Reviews.Content: After took less than 50 pictures a week ago , I turned on my camera today. But the battery is not working any more. Has to recharge again.

Reviews.Title: Charger and batteries works; rest are junk
Reviews.Author: Y T
Reviews.Content: Charger charges the batteries quickly; have not had a chance to put the batteries into the camera yet but don't see why they won't work.Rest of the package is pretty useless: especially the screen protector which needs to be manually cut to size. Won't be using it since it has developed creases during shipping. The cleaning cloth is just that, a small piece of smooth cloth; nothing special.

Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: TOBG
Reviews.Content: These came individually wrapped. I have used the charger and it works as advertized. I have not yet tried the individual battteries.

Reviews.Title: Great buy..
Reviews.Author: R. F. W "veiko"
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong with what you get for the money...Would recommend this to anyone interested. All this for less then the price of one battery.

Reviews.Title: Could be bettter
Reviews.Author: Ricardo M. R. Meirelles
Reviews.Content: It is not friendly aligning the positive and negative poles and the pins. The batteries could simply slip into a bed.

Reviews.Title: Sony CyberShot DSC-RX100 DSCRX100 HDR-AS10 HDR-AS15 Digital Camera Battery And Charger Kit Includes Qty 2 NP-BX1 Replacement Bat
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Knights
Reviews.Content: Sony CyberShot DSC-RX100 DSCRX100 HDR-AS10 HDR-AS15 Digital Camera Battery And Charger Kit Includes Qty 2 NP-BX1 Replacement Batteries , Battery Charger , LCD Screen Protectors , Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth.Charger is great, however in my case the 12volt cable was cut in half when I received it. The batteries only last about 75% of the original Sony. But you can't the price...

Reviews.Title: Another satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Shigeru Iwamoto "neko8"
Reviews.Content: I agree with the following submitted by another satisfied client:Not much to say except everything works great. The charger is great so now I can charge 2 batteries at the same time, one in camera, one in charger. The 2 included batteries are as good as the one that came with the camera. The screen protectors and cleaning cloth are just bonuses.

Reviews.Title: Does not fit Sony RX10
Reviews.Author: Shad314
Reviews.Content: Completely wrong battery for Sony R X 10, maybe fits the R x 100 MII or rx 1 sony cameras

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Twin Peaks
Reviews.Content: The ad showed OEM Sony batteries and what I got were cheap knockoffs and an even cheaper flimsy little plastic charger. I don't expect to get any life out of this garbage.

Reviews.Title: okay.
Reviews.Author: Umfahad
Reviews.Content: You get 2 batteries yes but the charger is not the one in the picture and the batteries do not fit which is absolutely useless since I purchased this item to get an external charger, instead I end up with more batteries and no charger .UPDATE: OK since there is no documentation it took me a day to figure this out but you need to flip the batteries upside down in order for them to fit .. it seems to work fine.

Reviews.Title: A Must Buy
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera.  Clear perfect picture and it's very easy to use.  At 20 mega pixels you picture can be easily blow us to make great canvas prints.  Why buy art when you can create your own.

Reviews.Title: The charger is useless. The batteries do not fit it.
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Herrmann
Reviews.Content: I bought this product because I hoped to recharge the generic Sony batteries that came with it.  However, the charger is useless as the batteries do not fit it.  On the other hand, the batteries work fine.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to the hype!
Reviews.Author: SoundHound
Reviews.Content: This tiny expensive camera replaces my Canon S-95 which was my favorite "handy" camera until the I bought the Sony. The Sony is almost identical in size to the S-95 except that the Zeiss branded lens sticks out a bit more. This Sony does everything the S-95 does but better and also seems to have every other feature imaginable.I especially like the manual focus with peaking at critical focus. Also the F1.8 lens (but only at the maximum 28mm-equivalent) and a huge sensor for this format. Note that my other usual cameras are the huge Nikon D4 and D800e (with battery grip). Yet I feel comfortable shooting at ISO 1600 for super deep depth of field shots for 8x10" and larger prints.Because this class of camera is so small it can be hard to grip securely. There is an aftermarket "hump" you can buy for about $40 (including postage) but I am content to cut out sections Velcro (loop side) and paste on where needed for a more secure grip. I am waiting for Adobe to issue an update to their RAW converter for this camera.

Reviews.Title: It's very close to what I need.
Reviews.Author: Maynard E. Morine "mick"
Reviews.Content: I need a small good quality camera for mybike trips. I have a very good SLR but it is too cumbersome to carry. I believe the RX 100 will do the job it is smaller than I expected so I think the fit is great!
